componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: APPLIES TO PARENT OPPORTUNITIES ONLY - Parent Opportunity Section

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: APPLIES TO CHILD OPPORTUNITIES ONLY - Aggregation Information

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Top tip - Likelihood field: 

Stage Field: this field refers to the progress of the Opportunity itself, ranging from initial discussions to the successful/unsuccessful closure of the Opportunity.


This should NOT be confused with the:


Likelihood field:  which references how likely the Opportunity Owner believes the customer is to use a CCS agreement for their procurement, at any stage of the opportunity. 

For example, the customer may encounter challenges in the later stages of which threaten the success of the Opportunity, you might then mark the likelihood as ‘Possible’ or ‘Unlikely’. 

Equally, the customer may be extremely confident that the Opportunity will result in a procurement through CCS, but the specifics and timelines are not detailed yet. So the likelihood could be ‘Highly Likely’ or ‘Likely’, but the Opportunity at Stage 0-2.


This field helps you to flag where more support or resource may be required to ensure success and helps with CCS pipeline forecasting. 

For more information, please contact cxdhub@crowncommercial.gov.uk
